metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4156 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
GNU Parallel before 20150522 (Nepal), when using (1) --cat or (2) --fifo with --sshlogin, allows local users to write to arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary file. It was discovered that Parallel incorrectly handled symlinks. An attacker could possibly use this issue to insert, edit or obtain sensitive information.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

parallel - 20161222-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: parallel package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161222-1').
